_xResult.title: Purple Reign Satin Evening Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made floor length evening dress with long sleeves
_xResult.longdesc:
Hello you...my, aren't you the elegant one?

 

If amethysts were fabric, this gorgeous deep purple dress would be a liquid gemstone. The perfectly fitted bodice with princess seams flatters your bustline and waist, with a full long skirt portion that can be customized to whatever length you prefer. Subtle, simple, drop dead gorgeous lines and construction. It's suitable for a bridal attendant or mother of the bride as well as holiday parties and special occasions. Wear with simple accessories or glam it up with sparkles for a spotlight grabbing entrance!

 

About the garment:

  • Fabric: premium Italian viscose/poly blend satin with luscious texture (40% viscose, 5% elastane, 55% polyester)
  • Neckline: slightly "boat neck" or bateau, can be modified for additional modesty if desired
  • Hidden zipper on back
  • Length: approximately 55" on a US standard size 8 but please specify desired length as measured from mid-shoulder down front, to floor or preferred length (include bust in your vertical measurement).

 

Use box below for customization requests and specifics.
